title: You're a goof. According to Komo, it was "bad news " that progress on the virus vaccine came under Trump.
subtitle: The remarks made by the Democrats in New York during an interview in the "Good Morning America" were seized by Republican legislators and commentators in favour of the right.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In November 9, 2020, New York Goff. Andrew Como said it was "bad news" that Pfizer developed what seemed to be a successful COVID-19 vaccine, during the United States President Donald Trump's term.
